author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member in Blue Springs, MO that is looking at purchasing IPads for City Council. She has some specific questions:
1) What software are other cites / counties using?
2) What are the pros and cons of using the device / via the Council’s thoughts?
3) What are IT’s thoughts on using the device?
4) Cultural issues?
5) Legal considerations/policy
title: IPad Specific Question
